review_data.title: too expensive and unfriendly staff

review_data.title: Great Pizza!
review_data.content: Looking for new pizza experiences in Zurich, we tried this place suggested by a colleague from Naples. Pizza was one of the best in Zurich and I loved the man made dessert. An aperol spritz and a limoncello to celebrate this new discovery! Prices are...More

review_data.title: Back after one year, even better
review_data.content: I am back after about a year. Happy to have found again great service and pizza. Looks like quality is still the top priority. Well done and keep doing!

review_data.title: Delicious pizza and very nice atmosphere!
review_data.content: Great antipasti and pizza! I didn’t taste arancini e sweets served there but they also looked good! Also the service is very nice. No complains.

review_data.title: Great pizza, one of the best in Zurich!

review_data.title: Schade

review_data.title: One of best pizza and tiramisu top!
review_data.content: Very good pizza done on a true Napoli-style. We took Bufalina and Fresca, and both were great. Great gelato and tiramisu was Champions League (hard to find that way in a restaurant, even in Italy).

review_data.title: One of the best italian food in Zurich
review_data.content: One of the best italian food in Zurich, excellent pizza really "napoletana" and sweets home made, like a great pistacchio tiramisu! Friendly service! I will be definitely back...

review_data.title: Excellent / ausgezeichnet / ottimo

review_data.title: Pizza
review_data.content: Sehr feine Pizza wie in Neapel. Sehr feine Dessert! freundliche Servierung sehr nett. Sehr empfelenswert.

review_data.title: Great italian food and great italian atmosphere
review_data.content: We were there on Sunday for the lunch. We were delighted to taste a great pizza napoletana and an homemade dessert. A delicious italian experience. Complimenti!
